item.description:
Open house 1-5PM Sunday
Larches Inn, 23 South Main Street, Carver Massachusetts,

Free Snacks - kale chips, guacamole and flax crackers, nori rolls, stuffed dates with pecans or chocolate

Activities - 2:00 Nori Roll Demo
- 3:00 Tong Ren Demonstration
- 4:00 Green Smoothie Demonstration

Also, on-going touring of the 3 acre property on Sampson Pond in beautiful Carver

Hosts - Joseph Lucier, Rosana Gijsen, Dorothy Torrey, Cindy Soby, Rain Philipps

Additional Discussion on Upcoming Programs

2 Day Foundational Wellness Weekend Retreat Summary:

May 21 (Friday Evening 6:00 to 8:30 PM)
May 22 (Saturday - Full Day)
May 23 (Sunday - Full Day)

* Includes 10 hours lectures, demonstrations and presentations - all meals, juices included
* Friday orientation, slide presentation, discussion, ending with meditation
* Friday and Saturday lodging included - Shared Room

5 Day Comprehensive Wellness Retreat Summary:

June 23, 24, 25, 26, 27 (Wednesday 7:30 AM through Sunday 4:00 PM)
July 21, 22, 24, 24, 25 (Wednesday 7:30 AM through Sunday 4:00 PM)
August 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 (Wednesday 7:30 AM through Sunday 4:00 PM)

Includes: All the Training and Health Educator Certificate
item.name: Larches Inn - Open House 1-5PM - Free Raw Food, Exciting Demos & Program Intro
